metadata.title: CVE-2018-20148 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, contributors could conductPHP object injection attacks via crafted metadata in a wp.getMediaItemXMLRPC call. This is caused by mishandling of serialized data at phar://URLs in the wp_get_attachment_thumb_file function in wp-includes/post.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20148` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.1+dfsg1-1').
